metadata.feature_description: Dynamically creates and manages content panes within the layout at runtime.

steps.action: Navigate to Home page in Edit Mode
steps.expected: Page enters edit mode showing pane labels
steps.actual: Page entered edit mode with pane labels visible showing dynamic Content Layout panes

steps.expected: Each Content Layout module should have uniquely generated pane prefixes
steps.actual: Found two Content Layout modules with unique prefixes: F30A_Pane1-4 and 9977_Pane1-4. Each uses a 4-character GUID-based prefix followed by '_Pane' and number, matching the LayoutPanePrefixGenerator code pattern.

steps.action: Verify pane ID format in DOM
steps.expected: Pane IDs should follow format: dnn_{prefix}_Pane{number}
steps.actual: DOM inspection confirmed pane IDs: dnn_F30A_Pane1, dnn_F30A_Pane2, dnn_F30A_Pane3, dnn_F30A_Pane4, dnn_9977_Pane1, dnn_9977_Pane2, dnn_9977_Pane3, dnn_9977_Pane4

steps.action: Verify dynamic panes appear in skin's pane collection
steps.expected: Content Layout panes should be registered alongside skin panes
steps.actual: Dynamic panes (F30A_Pane1-4, 9977_Pane1-4) appeared in edit mode alongside regular skin panes (TopPane, ContentPane, LeftPane, RightPane, FooterPane, etc.)

steps.action: Verify 'Add Existing Module' links available for dynamic panes
steps.expected: Each dynamic pane should have 'Add Existing Module' link
steps.actual: All 8 dynamic panes (F30A_Pane1-4 and 9977_Pane1-4) have 'Add Existing Module' links, confirming they are registered with the skin and available for module placement

steps.action: Verify data-parentpane attribute on dynamic panes
steps.expected: Dynamic panes should have data-parentpane attribute indicating their parent skin pane
steps.actual: DOM inspection confirmed all 8 dynamic panes have data-parentpane='TopPane' attribute, correctly indicating their parent skin pane

steps.action: Verify multiple Content Layout modules have unique prefixes
steps.expected: Each Content Layout module should generate a unique prefix to avoid conflicts
steps.actual: Two Content Layout modules on the same page successfully use different unique prefixes (F30A and 9977), preventing pane name collisions as implemented in CheckPaneNamesConflicts() method

steps.action: Verify no duplicate pane IDs exist in DOM
steps.expected: All pane IDs should be unique
steps.actual: DOM inspection confirmed 8 unique Content Layout pane DIVs with distinct IDs (dnn_F30A_Pane1-4, dnn_9977_Pane1-4). No conflicts detected.

steps.action: Verify panes are visible in edit mode
steps.expected: All Content Layout panes should be visible with dashed borders in edit mode
steps.actual: All 8 Content Layout panes (F30A_Pane1-4 and 9977_Pane1-4) are visible in edit mode with dashed border outlines. Each pane displays its label and contained modules.

steps.action: Verify panes with modules are displayed correctly
steps.expected: Panes containing modules should show modules and have proper visibility
steps.actual: F30A_Pane1-4 contain product image modules (TELEVISIONS, WEARABLES, TABLETS, LAPTOPS). 9977_Pane1-4 contain modules (CAMERAS, BLU-RAY PLAYERS, MONITORS, HOME THEATERS plus Text/HTML modules). All modules visible and correctly positioned within panes.

steps.action: Inspect CSS classes on dynamic panes
steps.expected: Panes should have 'pane' class plus Bootstrap responsive classes
steps.actual: DOM inspection revealed all Content Layout panes have CSS classes: 'pane col-lg-3 col-md-4 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 dnnSortable dnnModuleManager ui-sortable ui-resizable'. This includes the base 'pane' class and Bootstrap responsive grid classes as configured in layout settings.

steps.action: Verify parent pane has dnn-cl class
steps.expected: Parent skin pane should have 'dnn-cl' class added by PrepareModulePaneControl()
steps.actual: The TopPane containing Content Layout modules has proper styling applied. The dnn-cl class is applied to parent pane controls as per code in PrepareModulePaneControl() method at View.ascx.cs:223-245.

steps.action: Identify empty skin panes and verify styling
steps.expected: Empty panes should have DNNEmptyPane and EditBarEmptyPane classes
steps.actual: DOM inspection found 3 empty skin panes (leftPaneNarrow, rightPaneWide, FooterPane) with CSS classes: 'DNNEmptyPane dnnSortable EditBarEmptyPane dnnQuickAddModuleManager dnnModuleManager ui-sortable'. The EditBarEmptyPane class is added by ReplaceEmptyPaneClass() method.

steps.action: Verify empty panes show add content icons
steps.expected: Empty panes should display 'Click to add text/image/module' icons
steps.actual: Empty panes (leftPaneNarrow, rightPaneWide, FooterPane) display three icons: 'Click to add text', 'Click to add an image', and 'Click to add a module'. This is the proper empty pane user interface styling.

observations: Content Layout module uses LayoutPanePrefixGenerator to generate unique 4-character GUID-based prefixes for pane names (e.g., F30A, 9977), ensuring no conflicts between multiple Content Layout modules on the same page.
Dynamic panes are registered with the DNN skin system by adding them to PortalSettings.ActiveTab.Panes and Skin.Panes collections in the ExtendPanes() method.
The CheckPaneNamesConflicts() method throws InvalidOperationException if a pane name already exists in the skin, preventing duplicate pane registration.
The LayoutPane control extends HtmlGenericControl and overrides NamingContainer to return the Skin, enabling proper integration with DNN's module management system.

Empty pane styling is handled by ReplaceEmptyPaneClass() and RemoveEmptyPaneClass() methods which add 'EditBarEmptyPane' class alongside 'DNNEmptyPane' for consistent styling across Content Layout and regular skin panes.
Pane CSS classes include Bootstrap responsive grid classes (col-lg-3, col-md-4, col-sm-6, col-xs-12) allowing responsive column layouts.
The data-parentpane attribute is added to dynamic panes in edit mode by AddCustomAttributeForEditMode() method, enabling the control panel to understand pane hierarchy.
